alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:24AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lauderdale and western Colbert Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 324 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Iuka, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Waterloo, Malone, Mynot, Mt Hester, Margerum, Riverton, Wright, Oakland and Barton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
